info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 March 2024,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This apartment is conveniently located and has everything one could need for a comfortable stay. The washing machine was a great asset. info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 June 2023
rating_comment: My wife and I stayed at nahids place for 7 days and overall was amazing, very tidy and as described rafique is a jenerous home keeper and cleaning is already provided, will recommend for future guests and visitors.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 May 2023,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
My wife and I stayed here from April 30th to May 13th 2023. We loved the location of the building as its in an upscale neighborhood with lots of restaurants and shopping areas only few minutes of walking distance. The security in the building is the best Ive seen in any place in Dhaka.
As for the house, the layout of the house is very nice with lots of paintings with lots of spaces. The house was very clean with clean bathrooms and hot showers. There are air conditions in the living room and the 2 bedrooms. There is a big screen TV with Netflix and YouTube app thats great for entertainment. The kitchen is very nice with a brand new microwave. There is a house cleaner that comes in every day and cleans the entire place. Internet was pretty good as I had to work from home. Ms. Nahid is a great host and if I asked for anything, she didnt hesitate. Mr. Rafiq was also amazing. Highly recommended and I will definitely stay here the next time Im back in Dhaka

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 February 2023,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Calm and secure place to live.Overall the best.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 January 2023,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I had a nice stay at Nahids apartment. I stayed there two times. Both times I found the apartment to be clean. Nahid is accommodating and helpful. I would recommend to those wishing to stay near the airport to stay at Nahids apartment.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 January 2023,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The apartment is conveniently located near the airport. I like that the host provided transportation upon arrival from the airport to the apartment. The host, Nahid, was very helpful and always responded to my requests. The apartment is spacious for two persons.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 January 2023,  路 Stayed with kids
rating_comment: The place is close to the airport with 24/7 availability of guards. Furthermore, it also has the provision of a maid to clean the apartment on a daily basis. Hence, the apartment is very clean and maintained well. Ms. Nahid speaks good English; hence, it's much easy to communicate and responds very quickly. My recommendation about the apartment is 10/10. Thanks a lot, Nahid and we wish to come back again !!!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 March 2022,  路 Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
We visited Bangladesh for vacation from USA and stayed here for 20 days. We did enjoyed staying at Nahid's place. It was comfortable for our family of 4 (2 adults, 2 kids) . She was kind enough to provide us airport pick up and drop off services. It was very helpful. She and her support staff (caretaker, manager, guard, cleaning lady, etc.) were very helpful. They communicated well and supported us 100% whenever we needed something. One comment I would like to make that the kitchen, bathroom and other minor things around the apartment could use minor upgrades. Nothing major.
Overall, Our stay was very pleasant. I highly recommend this place and we would stay at Nahid's place again on our next trip to Dhaka.
